item.description:
And who is Florian one might ask....Florian is our German NHCer from back in the day! For those of you who haven't met Florian, he lived in New Haven for a year on work study and was a very active member of the NHC. He was a regular at Monday HHs, on the softball team and took lots of shopping trips with us to the outlets.

He's visiting from Germany with his girlfriend Melanie in 12/29 and wants to meet up with anyone around.

If you knew him from early on, come on out and say hi. If you never met him before, come on out and say hi!!

Contact: Robyn-Allise 203-823-5302
item.name: Meet Florian
